text: Enabling the people to nourish their living and mourn their dead, without any feeling against any, is the first step of the rule of virtue.
...dividing up the empire, parcelling it out in fiefs to the various kings and marquises, he was hailed as the mighty conqueror...
No one will follow a useless emperor. You know that, don't you?
[[b]]%+n%[[/b]] income from looting settlements and post-battle loot
A New Era, A New Ruler.

After centuries, the old Han Dynasty has finally lost the Mandate of Heaven. Yet the people under heaven still suffer from the chaos of war brought by petty warlords and their false claims to the Mandate. My Lord, you must end this. China awaits a ruler who will bring unity and prosperity to the realm. How will you choose to rule the people of China?
China will be ruled by virtue
China will be ruled by might
You are the only one who can bring lasting peace to China. Everyone must obey your will.
You are the only one who can bring lasting peace to China. Everyone must obey your will.
